backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor exposing a no-op healthCheck query.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping gameplay requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend game files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component applying safe-area insets and wrapping GameScreen with an orientation guard.
frontend/src/game/effects/Explosion.tsx: Explosion renderer providing hit, player, and bomb variants with deterministic ember layouts.
frontend/src/game/entities/Bullet.tsx: Bullet visual component with glow, core, and trailing effect positioned by percentage coords.
frontend/src/game/entities/Obstacle.tsx: Hexagonal obstacle renderer with size scaling and boss-specific red visual scheme.
frontend/src/game/entities/PlayerJet.tsx: React component rendering the player jet with rotation and thrust animations using layered SVG and glow effects.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game loop handling state, movement, collisions, bullets, obstacles, explosions, scoring, and transitions.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useJoystickSensi: React hook managing joystick sensitivity with localStorage persistence and validation.
frontend/src/game/physics/bounds.ts: Utility functions to clamp positions, detect borders, and reflect velocities at playfield bounds.
frontend/src/game/physics/obstacleCollis: Elastic collision resolver for circular obstacles with separation, damping, clamping, and safety guards.
frontend/src/game/physics/playerObstacle: Determines if a playerâ€“obstacle overlap is deep enough to count as a full collision triggering game over.
frontend/src/game/physics/vectors.ts: Vector utilities for angle conversion, velocity scaling to percentages, and offsetting positions.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Playfield container with border, corner accents, and grid overlay for the game area.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverlay.tsx: UI overlay handling HUD, controls, progress bars, and state-based displays during gameplay.
frontend/src/game/ui/OrientationGuard.ts: Component that forces landscape play, showing a rotate-device prompt when in portrait orientation.
frontend/src/game/ui/ShootButton.tsx: Touch-friendly fire button managing pointer capture to trigger start and end of firing.
frontend/src/game/ui/VirtualJoystick.tsx: Implements a touch-based virtual joystick with deadzone handling and pointer tracking to emit movement or neutral events.
frontend/src/game/utils/joystickMovement: Transforms raw joystick displacement into normalized direction and curved speed factor with deadzone and speed scaling.
frontend/src/game/utils/levelTimer.ts: Provides level-based countdown duration and functions to format remaining time as a display string.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, loading, login, logout, and context provisioning for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because the game uses only client-side state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, theme variables, and game-specific Tailwind layers and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, game colors, containers, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requirements for fixing obstacle visibility and showing a time-up message.
